attributes.title: How To Play With All The Forces - Using Consciousness!
attributes.description:
Satsang delivered on 25th November 2019

*GREATEST REVELATION FROM KAILAASA - PARAMASHIVA JNANA AND PARAMASHIVA VIJNANA. 

*SCIENTIST HAVE MAPPED 4 PRINCIPLE FORCES OF NATURE - GRAVITY, ELECTROMAGNETISM, STRONG FORCE AND WEAK NUCLEAR FORCE. THEY ELABORATE, PRESENT FACTS AND UNDERSTANDINGS ABOUT THESE FORCES. THERE IS FIFTH FORCE: AWAKENED CONSCIOUSNESS OPERATING THROUGH THE BODY IS THE FIFTH FORCE. 
*PARAMASHIVATVA MEANING THE SPACE OF PARAMASHIVA. THE PRM BEYOND FORM, FORMLESS, NAME, NAMELESSNESS, BEYOND BEING, BEYOND EVEN WHAT IS PURUSHA - THAT PARAMASHIVA, WHEN HE OPERATES THROUGH THE BODY IS ESHWARA. WHEN HE MANIFEST WITH FORM , NAME , PURPOSE - HE IS ESHWARA.
*AWAKENED CONSCIOUSNESS MANIFESTING THROUGH THE BODY, EMBODIED CONSCIOUSNESS IS THE FIFTH FORCE. 
*AWAKENING YOUR CONSCIOUSNESS HAS DIRECT UTILITY VALUE IN YOUR LIFE BECAUSE ALL THESE 4 FORCES OF NATURE ELABORATED BY SCIENCE. ALL THESE 4 CAN BE PLAYED AROUND IN ANY WAY YOU WANT WITH ESHWARATVA; AWAKENING YOUR CONSCIOUSNESS.
*IF YOU ARE NOT INTRODUCED TO EXISTENCE OF CONSCIOUSNESS, YOU WILL NOT BE ABLE TO ENJOY LIFE TO ITS FULLEST. GETTING INTRODUCED ABOUT CONSCIOUSNESS IN YOUR SYSTEM, IN YOUR COGNITION, A NEW POSSIBILITY OPENS. THIS IS THE LOGIC OR SCIENCE OF THE FIFTH POWER. 
*THE SPACE (KATAKASHA), EVEN THE PLACE WHERE WE ARE LIVING IS KATAKASHA. MAHAKASHA IS THE OPEN SPACE
*EXAMPLE: THE OPEN SPACE MAHAKASHA AND THE SPACE INSIDE THE POT, KATAKASHA, BECAUSE OF THE JAATI(NATURE) OF AKASHA, BOTH ARE ONE AND THE SAME. BECAUSE OF THEIR UPATH I(ATTRIBUTES) THEY ARE DIFFERENT. 
*MAHAKASHA IS PURE SPACE. KATAKASHA, IS SPACE INSIDE THE POT. THIS TWO, BECAUSE OF THEIR JAATI , THEY ARE ONE AND THE SAME. BECAUSE OF THEIR UPATHI (ATTRIBUTES) THEY ARE DIFFERENT. PARAMASHIVA AND THE SOUL OPERATING IN YOUR BODY. BOTH ARE BY THEIR JAATI OF CONSCIOUSNESS, THEY ARE ONE AND THE SAME. BY THEIR UPATHI (ATTRIBUTES), THEY MAY LOOK DIFFERENT. 
*YOU FEELING YOU ARE DIFFERENT FROM PARAMASHIVA IS DISRESPECT TO PARAMASHIVA. YOU FEEL YOU ARE ONE WITH PARAMASHIVA IS RESPECT TO PARAMASHIVA.IF YOU UNDERSTAND THIS ONE TRUTH, THIS CAN HELP YOU PLAY WITH THE 4 FORCES. THIS CAN HELP YOU TO STRATEGISE AND WIN IN ALL SITUATIONS IN LIFE.
*WHEN YOUR CONSCIOUSNESS IS AWAKENED, THE FIRST THING HAPPEN TO YOU IS YOU BECOME ABSOLUTELY DHARMIC AND FEARLESS.
*A SIMPLE UNDERSTANDING, EVEN NOW, WHEN YOU MEDITATE AND COGNISE YOU ARE PARAMASHIVA, THE GRAVITY, HEAVINESS, WORRYING IN YOUR INNER SPACE WILL DROP. FEELING HEAVY IS GRAVITY WORKING ON YOU. THE ELECTROMAGNETISM CHANGES IMMEDIATELY. CONSTANT FEAR IS ONE KIND OF ELECTROMAGNETIC FORCE. WHEN YOU SHIFT IT TO PARAMASHIVA, IT WILL JUST SHIFT IMMEDIATELY. INSTEAD OF BEING TORTURED AND HARASSED BY FEARS AND FEAR INSTIGATED INTUITION, YOU WILL MANIFEST THE CONSCIOUS WISH AND VISION. ELECTROMAGNETIC FORCE WILL CHANGE WHEN YOU REALISE YOU ARE PARAMASHIVA. 
*THE WEAK NUCLEAR FORCE IS YOUR WEAK GUTS. NOT ABLE TO DIGEST WHAT IS HAPPENING IN LIFE. IF YOU COGNISE AND REMEMBER YOU ARE PARAMASHIVA, YOU WILL BE ABLE TO DIGEST ANYTHING, YOU WILL NOT HAVE ANY MENTAL BREAKDOWN. STRONG NUCLEAR FORCE MEANS THE STRATEGIES YOU MANIFEST AND DECISIONS YOU TAKE. IT IS TO DO WITH YOUR GUTS. 
*WHETHER YOU WANT WEALTH, HEALTH OR ANYTHING YOU WANT TO MANIFEST. THAT STATE , SPACE, BEING OR CONSCIOUSNESS OF PARAMASHIVA, REMEMBER THIS ONE POWERFUL COGNITION. YOU ARE PARAMASHIVA BY JAATI. JAATI MATTERS NOT UPADATI. YOUR NATUREM MATTERS, NOT ATTRIBUTES. ATTRIBUTES CAN CHANGE BY TOMORROW! 
IF YOU COGNISE THIS, YOU CAN PLAY WITH ALL THE 4 FORCES - ELECTROMAGNETIC FORCE, GRAVITY, WEAK NUCLEAR FORCE AND STRONG FORCE. 
*I WILL PROVE TO THE WORLD, PHYSICALLY, ALL THE 4 FORCES CAN BE MANIPULATED WITH CONSCIOUSNESS. THE WHOLE SCIENCE OF POWER MANIFESTATIONS IS THIS. WHEN YOU START MANIFESTING THE POWER OF LEVITATION, YOU ARE PLAYING WITH GRAVITY. WHEN YOU ARE MANIFESTING THE POWER OF CONSCIOUSNESS OVER MATTER, MOVING THE OBJECT WITHOUT TOUCHING, YOU ARE PLAYING WITH ELECTROMAGNETISM. WHEN YOU PLAY WITH THE CLARITY THAT YOU ARE PARAMASHIVA, YOU DONâ€™T BECOME EGOISTIC, YOU ARE A DEVA. WHEN YOU PLAY WITH EGO, YOU ARE DEMON.
